name: Drift City Donut Delivery
description:
Drift City Donut Delivery!

IMPORTANT! All Donations above $10 Will be split with the Ukraine Relief Fund, I'm a single developer and struggle to earn enough to live but even still, I want to use this oppurtunity to help with the situation in the Ukraine as much as Possible So I've decided all Donations made via this prototype exceeding $10 will be split with the Human Appeal Relief Charity. Alternatively if you want to Donate right to the Charity Please visit: https://humanappeal.org.uk/donate to Give Directly.

You are a Drift City Donut Delivery Driver! Deliver Donuts, Run Down Rival Donut Gangs in Donut Driven Hit and Run's!  Earn Cash to Upgrade your Ride with all sorts of performance and Cosmetic Enhancements and be the Donut Delivery Drift King!

-Use the Dash Move to Phase through Fences and other solid obstacles!
-Use the Nitro/Turbo Boost to briefly achieve ludicrous speeds!
-Full Physics based Vehicle with Many Customization Options!
-In Depth Tutorial
-Interactable Scenery, Smash through Light Poles, Parking Meters, Fire Hydrants, Piles of Boxes etc
-Find Powerups and Secret Cash Stashes!
-Upgrade your Vehicle and Abilities!

Play with Mouse and Keyboard or with Game Pad.

Made in a Little under 2 months, using my Custom Vehicle Kit and Free asset Packs from Epic and Sketchfab as a proof of concept for a Crazy Taxi/Simpsons Hit and Run Style Game.
So naturally its an Extremely Early Access Prototype that I may revist it down the line.

Sadly I can't afford to work on this project anymore, so if you do enjoy it and want to see it expanded into a full game, feel free to Donate to the Project and I'll do my best to update it to include the following features:

-More Delivery Vehicles!
-More Customization Options!
-More Cities to Explore and Free Roam!
-New Mechanics such as Bunny Hops
-Being able to exit the vehicle and roam on foot (potentially to find and unlock new additional vehicles barn find style)!
-Single Player story Component
-More NPC's (Potentially custom made if I can afford to commission 3D Modelling and animation artists)
-Bug Fixes, Physics tweaks, Customizable Controls, Settings and more!
